name: IDK Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of a recruiting software designed to connect potential employees to employers. The company's platform is a sourcing-as-a-Service-based software tool that automates the candidate sourcing process for growing companies, reducing manual effort and wastage of time, enabling clients to save time with automated contact data.
one_liner: Developer of a recruiting software designed to connect potential employees to employers. The company's platform is a sourcing-as-a-Service-based software tool that automates the candidate sourcing process for growing companies, reducing manual effort and wastage of time, enabling clients to save time with automated contact data.
